review_comments: tests/spec/client-spec.json:7 - The Autobahn config still dials ws://host.docker.internal:8080, but the workflow no longer adds the host alias and GitHub's Linux runners don't expose that name by default. With --network host the container can just talk to ws://127.0.0.1:8080; as-is the spec step fails with a DNS error before any tests run.

tests/spec/spec-server.ts:8 - This server just wraps Bun.serve and echoes payloads, so the suite never exercises revurb-ts's handshake/routing logic; it only verifies Bun's built-in WebSocket. Please boot the revurb server/router here (similar to the PHP spec-server.php) so we actually test the ported code.
additional_comments: README.md and docs.md still describe the PHP repo; once the spec harness targets revurb-ts we still need to refresh those docs.
